original_title: Sri Lanka’s President condemns assassination of Hamas political leader
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s President Ranil Wickremesinghe has expressed his strong condemnation of the assassination of Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh.
Addressing a meeting with former Provincial Council members, Wickremesinghe “stated unequivocally that he will never condone such actions,” his media division said.
Haniyeh was killed in Iran’s capital Tehran in an air strike at about 02:00 local time, foreign media reports said.
The killing of the 62-year-old ceasefire negotiator has sparked fears of a wider war. (Colombo/Jul31/2024)
